main.name: Software Developer
main.description: Currently taking Master's. Looking for full-time role in Software Development starting June 2021. Lover of code, coffee and dog
main.bio: Hi, I am Full Stack Developer with expertise in Web and Mobile app development. My top skills includes React.js, React Native, CSS, Node.js and PHP. I would love to convert business idea into real world business application. I do enjoy working on complex problems and chanllenging tasks.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to stay updated

resume.skillmessage: I am experienced Full Stack Developer with 2 years of well-rounded professional experience. Below are list of my top notch skills. Apart from technical skills I do have a solid understanding of MVC architecture, worked on agile methodology and have a strong problem solving skills.

work.title: Full Stack Developer Co-op
description: Working with the team remotely on a delivery service app using Node.js & Express.js for back-end.
Built reusable UI components using React.js, TypeScript and used Redux for state management.
Implemented complete workflow of making an order from the app and managed transaction statuses.
Leveraged various AWS services such as S3, EC2 and Lambda functions.

work.title: Software Developer
description: Responsible for developing dynamic websites and involed in all aspects of software development ranging from database design to product deployment.
Worked on enterprise level projects using agile methodology in PHP MVC architecture.
Converted high level requirements into best user experience by writing optimized back-end code.
Delivered scalable software in a timely manner and used project management tools.

projects.title: City Directory
projects.category: City directory to show neary by places, restaurants, and other useful stuf around the city using google place API

projects.title: Dark theme based Portfolio
projects.category: Portfolio website built using pure HTML, CSS and JavaScript and hosted on github pages

projects.title: Company Website and Delivery app
projects.category: Delivery service app using React.js, Node.js,React-Native and TypeScript

projects.title: Pythia - SAAS for Wireless instruction device
projects.category: Back-end and Admin Panel for organization

projects.title: Amazon Clone
projects.category: Currently building Amazon clone for fun

testimonials.text: I wish him best for his Master's in Canada. Hope he will continue working for our company software which he made so neat and easy to use. I and my employees will thankful for him for making great user friendly HR system for our company.

Devarsh must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It was amazing to work with him. The way he involve in my business working before developing my event firm website is making him ideal freelancer. Wishing you more success Devarsh!
